long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simplify your daily web experience with Cisco CUCM

- Highlight Non-Defaults on Enterprise and Service Parameters page
- Direct links to CIs (such as  CSS, Location, Device Pool, Device Security Profile and many more)
- Load automatically all Lists when entering the site
- Direct Link to the screenshot page of deskphones
- Set CFA for all Call Forward CSS options
- History bar
- Filter tables
- Export to CSV
